title: (x) got milk content identification please - Kabel {Rainer}
content: the actual got milk? text is called phenix american but the content with the information on their ads I cant seem to figure out, it looks like helvetica rounded but it's thinner than that so...help!
author: annettekoz

comments.content:
HERE IS A LINK TO AN IMAGE

[http://www.thehypefactor.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/01/rihanna-got-milk...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100402023406/http:/www.thehypefactor.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/01/rihanna-got-milk.jpg "http://www.thehypefactor.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/01/rihanna-got-milk.jpg")
Sheesh, too small for me eyes, but the g and the e remind me of simply [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20100402023406/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1ZA) …

Hi Annette,  
it is not quite clear to me for which typeface you are looking: ‘Drink it in' indeed looks like Kabel, ‘body by milk' and ‘got milk?’ are two different ones.  
F
